mapper.insert: insert into match_reply(match_reply_no, member_id, match_reply_content, match_reply_time, match_reply_group, match_board_no) values(#{matchReplyNo}, #{memberId}, #{matchReplyContent}, sysdate, 0, #{matchBoardNo})
mapper.select: select * from match_reply where match_board_no = #{matchBoardNo} order by match_reply_no asc
mapper.update: update match_reply set match_reply_content = #{matchReplyContent} where match_reply_no = #{matchReplyNo}
